name: M.I.N.G.I
description: After thousands of years of research, the human race has discovered the ultimate proof that there is no creator outside the natural laws of our galaxy, a cell capable of independently creating organic material. However, it has fallen into the hands of an evil organization with selfish aims to dominate the planet and establish a regime of slavery with the help of the creative cell. We, a secret organization that defends the earth and human beings from themselves, will battle for life on earth and get the Matter of independent natural and genetic integration, or what we know as ...M.I.N.G.I.
